suggestions.original: To improve the picture organization, consider spacing out the elements a bit more to reduce the crowded feeling. This can be achieved by either enlarging the canvas or reducing the size of some elements. Additionally, creating a clearer hierarchy by emphasizing the main subjects (such as the children) and using lighter or less saturated colors for the background elements (like clouds and birds) can help guide the viewer's eye more effectively through the composition. This will enhance the overall flow and make the scene more visually balanced.
